### Criteria

The reference reading must be within the 2S limits specified in the document ["Control Map Limits"](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/123VjdBfflTJLL7lTrm3UF57qQ_6ZcISXUEIBWVjGe5E/edit?usp=sharing).
These 2S limits are the values from the control chart of the year X-1.
If the measured value does not meet this requirement, the control chart must be consulted to accept or reject the results.
